dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach new information in a methodical and logical manner, breaking it down into smaller components.
Your FarTwin will approach new information with curiosity and enthusiasm, often diving headfirst into unfamiliar territory.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be outgoing and sociable, seeking to engage with others and build connections.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter, more low-key settings, often taking time to recharge alone.

dimensions.label: Technical Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be hands-on and practical, preferring to learn through experimentation and trial-and-error.
Your FarTwin will approach technical tasks with a focus on theory and understanding, often preferring to analyze and explain concepts before applying them in practice.

dimensions.label: Financial Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make financial decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be cautious with finances, prioritizing saving and conserving resources over spending.
Your FarTwin will be willing to spend money freely, investing in experiences and opportunities that bring joy and fulfillment.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be motivated and productive, tackling multiple tasks with energy and enthusiasm.
Your FarTwin will approach tasks in a more relaxed and flexible manner, prioritizing self-care and flexibility over strict schedules.

dimensions.label: Entertainment Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin enjoy downtime?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer active entertainment, such as sports or exercise, to relax and recharge.
Your FarTwin will prefer more passive forms of entertainment, such as reading or watching movies, to unwind.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be competitive and driven, seeking to outdo others and achieve individual success.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and cooperation, working together with others towards a common goal.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems with a logical and analytical mindset, breaking them down into manageable parts.
Your FarTwin will rely on intuition and instincts to guide their problem-solving approach, often trusting their gut feelings and emotions.
